name: Ghost Hunter (Delacroz)
description:
In the game you are a guy who's  hired to capture ghosts in a haunted house, them you need to stun the enemys and then ABSORB then into a box!

TUTORIAL:

WASD movement;

use your mouse to move the camera;

Use the E key to interact with things and enemies;

Use the left click of your mouse to fire enemies;

Thats IT!

Credits: 

Game Designer: Luis Augusto

Programmer, Sound Designer and Modeller: Andre Menezes
